mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_collection_entrust_debt ( debt_id, entrust_id, entrust_begin_time, entrust_expire_time, STATUS, create_time ) values
( #{item.debtId}, #{item.entrustId}, #{item.entrustBeginTime}, #{item.entrustExpireTime}, #{item.status}, #{item.createTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id AS id, t1.debt_id AS debtId, t1.entrust_id AS entrustId, t1.entrust_begin_time AS entrustBeginTime, t1.entrust_expire_time AS entrustExpireTime, t1.entrust_end_time AS entrustEndTime, t1.`STATUS` AS status, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.update_time AS updateTime from t_collection_entrust_debt t1 join t_arrear_debt t2 on t2.id = t1.debt_id where t2.`status` != -1 AND t1.entrust_end_time is null AND entrust_id = #{entrustId}
and t2.creditor_id = #{orgId}

update.foreach:
update t_collection_entrust_debt
debt_id = #{item.debtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
entrust_id = #{item.entrustId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
entrust_begin_time = #{item.entrustBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
entrust_expire_time = #{item.entrustExpireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
entrust_end_time = #{item.entrustEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
